channel.title: How can i make coomands for different things
channel.description:
i want to know how to make a command for;
::christams = santa hat, scarves and hats, crackers and a sledge
::easter = bunny ears, easter egg bag, easter egg
::halloween, scythe, masks and a pumpkin
::pirate = gives you ALL pirate clothes, pirate hat and eyepatch
::bird = turns you into a gull (pnpc)
::elf = turns you into a elf (monster name="Lord Iorwerth" combat="0" type="1182" description="An elf lord.">) ::dwarf = (- <monster name="Dwarf gang member" combat="44" type="1795" description="A short stout) ::wizard =(- <monster name="Dark mage" combat="0" type="2262" description="An initiate of Zamorak.">
king, gives you gilded body, legs and kite, yellow phat, cooking gauntlets, white boots, sara staff and legends cape

item.title: How can i make coomands for different things
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Mike Mad Mike
item.source: How can i make coomands for different things

item.title: How can i make coomands for different things
item.dc:creator: @littleplop littleplop
item.description:
@littleplop wrote:

well you say you want :: witch is if a player type it so you would need this

[code]
else if (command.startsWith(“thename of command”) && playerRights >=0)
{
[end]
so when yuo type that it will do what you want it to do but it ant gona get you item with out this

[code]
addItem(itemcode,1);
[end]
so you put the item coad in that and you get them from item.cfg some items mite crash the server if you have an old client…
so say ::dragon it would look liek this

[code]
else if (command.startsWith(“dragon”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(3140,1);
addItem(4087,1);
addItem(4585,1);
addItem(1149,1);
addItem(1187,1);
addItem(1377,1);
addItem(775,1);
addItem(4131,1);
addItem(4151,1);
addItem(6570,1);
addItem(6585,1);
}
[end]
see this “}” you must have this at the end of a command it it will not work so when you type ::dragon it will give the items… like item 6585 so on… to make it send you a message you would needto add like the other lines… this

[code]
sendMessage(“make sure your message is in side the " ok”);
[end]
but w.e heres some rare coads any way…
gives all rares and i cant remember if its all the hats and shit but w.e here

[code]
else if (command.startsWith(“rares”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(1038,1);
addItem(1040,1);
addItem(1042,1);
addItem(1044,1);
addItem(1046,1);
addItem(1048,1);
addItem(1057,1);
addItem(1055,1);
addItem(1053,1);
addItem(1050,1);
addItem(1037,1);
addItem(1419,1);
addItem(4566,1);
addItem(4084,1);
addItem(4565,1);
addItem(962,1);
addItem(1959,1);
addItem(1961,1);
addItem(4562,1);
addItem(4564,1);
addItem(6858,1);
addItem(6859,1);
addItem(6856,1);
addItem(6857,1);
addItem(6862,1);
addItem(6863,1);
addItem(6860,1);
addItem(6861,1);
sendMessage(“FUCK PAYING MILLS FOR THSI SHIT!!!”);
}
[end]
i made this command

[code]
else if (command.startsWith(“phats”) && playerRights >=0)
{
addItem(1039,10000);
addItem(1041,10000);
addItem(1043,10000);
addItem(1045,10000);
addItem(1047,10000);
addItem(1049,10000);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“masks”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(1054,10000);
addItem(1056,10000);
addItem(1058,10000);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“drops”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(1050,1);
addItem(1037,1);
addItem(1419,1);
addItem(1961,1);
addItem(1959,1);
addItem(962,1);
}

		else if (command.startsWith("bluephat") && playerRights >= 0)
		{
			addItem(1042,1);
		}
		else if (command.startsWith("greenphat") && playerRights >= 0)
		{
			addItem(1044,1);
		}
		else if (command.startsWith("purplephat") && playerRights >= 0)
		{
			addItem(1046,1);
		}
		else if (command.startsWith("redphat") && playerRights >= 0)
		{
			addItem(1038,1);
		}

[end]
i did not make them oneswho ever made testscape did

to add them just open up “client.java” and press on the key bord -.- "ctrl + f this will bring up a find then in that type a know command that would be in there like “bank” so sarch for all this with the " and you shod see soem thing with
openUpBank();
and it after the } on this script or above witch ever you want -.- lol
bye yes i know i talk to much -.- lol[/code][/code][/code][/code][/code][/code]
